dhajaye bhawithaya niyama karanu labuye indiyanu dhajaye wywastha sangrahaya wisin wana athara rajya lanjanaye nithin da adala we.mulika wyawasthawa anuwa paudgalika purawasiyanta jathika dinayanhidi enam nidahas dinaya(indiyawa) ha janaraja dinaya(indiyawa) nhidi hara anekuth dinayanhidi bhawitha kirima thahanam wi thibuni. 2002 hidi paudgalika purawasiyange abhiyachanayak wibhaga kirimen anathuruwa nawin jindal wisin indiyawe shreshtadhikaranaya mangin indiyanu aanduwata lada niyogayakin paudgalika purawasiyanta dhajaya bhawithaya sandaha wyawastha sanshodhanaya sidu wiya.pasuwa indiyanu amathya mandala sangamaya dhajaya simitha bhawithayan sandaha wyawastha sanshodhanaya sidu kerini.

indiya dhiwara amathyawaraya ha widesha amathyawaraya me sambandhayen dak wu namyashili piliwetha ha dosthara rajitha senarathna amathiwaraya anugamanaya kala thanthrika piliwetha dhiwarayin nidahasa kara ganime kriyadamaya metharam wegayen sidu wimata hethu wi thibenawa.ese ma mita ihatha di yojana karagath paridi derate ma niladharin sahabhagiwana kamituwak magin me gataluwa min idiriyata mema gataluwa wisanda ganimatath ehi di sidu wana apahasuthawayan wentham derate dhiwara amathyawarun dedenage ekangathawayakin eeta wisandum soya ganimatath ekanga wi thibima wadagath.me sama gataluwakata abhyantharaye deshapalanaya musu wi thibima swabhawikayi.
